about_the_game:
Dark Dominion – Souls Like, a new generation game from ZERO5GAMES Studio.

In Ancient times there was piece and quiet in Artsworth Kingdom but the evil ruled supreme. The usurper, Ernest VIII, seized the throne and sold the evil forces his and the other residents’ souls for the wealth and vanity. Kingdom archimages tried to put everything to its place but it was too late. He dreamed of enslaving the whole continent, his warriors were sold on certain death but the curse was able to win and his kingdom was fully maledicted and destroyed. You are assigned to return the kingdom its ancient glory, totally override the evil seized this world and fight against the seven mighty gods of human sins. Let light or darkness lead you to victory or oblivion, my death knight.

Extraordinary new generation graphics – be ready to see the photorealism that you have never met in the games of the same genre. The picture would be literally realistic.

Cruel game world – the enemy is simply in rage fancying to bear you down. Unbelievable difficulty level that has never been seen in Souls games.

The total absence of hero upgrade – he will be upgraded only with the elite equipment farming.

Solve all this world mysteries and learn what had happened to the main character in the end and what is taking place in the world.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of cruelty and violence, chopping off limbs, meat, corpses, blood. The game is not recommended for particularly sensitive people.

detailed_description:
Dark Dominion – Souls Like, a new generation game from ZERO5GAMES Studio.

In Ancient times there was piece and quiet in Artsworth Kingdom but the evil ruled supreme. The usurper, Ernest VIII, seized the throne and sold the evil forces his and the other residents’ souls for the wealth and vanity. Kingdom archimages tried to put everything to its place but it was too late. He dreamed of enslaving the whole continent, his warriors were sold on certain death but the curse was able to win and his kingdom was fully maledicted and destroyed. You are assigned to return the kingdom its ancient glory, totally override the evil seized this world and fight against the seven mighty gods of human sins. Let light or darkness lead you to victory or oblivion, my death knight.

Extraordinary new generation graphics – be ready to see the photorealism that you have never met in the games of the same genre. The picture would be literally realistic.

Cruel game world – the enemy is simply in rage fancying to bear you down. Unbelievable difficulty level that has never been seen in Souls games.

The total absence of hero upgrade – he will be upgraded only with the elite equipment farming.

Solve all this world mysteries and learn what had happened to the main character in the end and what is taking place in the world.

short_description: Dark Dominion – Souls Like, a new generation game from ZERO5GAMES Studio. Stay on the side of light or darkness destroying the hordes of monsters in the doom gothic kingdom of Artsworth that had survived the end of human era.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
